list_definition.definition: a tool with a cutting edge at the end

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was using a chisel to carve the stone.

list_definition.definition: to cut or carve (wood etc) with a chisel

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The sculptor was chiselling the features on a statue.
